title: Patch Notes: November 10, 2025
details: - Addressed a reported issue where performance would drop in the Fadefields.
- The 'Mercenary Day' event has now concluded. Thanks for playing!
- **Amon:** Increased the damage of the 'Phaseflare' skill by 10%.
- **Harlowe:** Fixed a bug where the 'Big Guns' skill would not apply correctly to certain heavy weapons.

title: Hotfix: November 3, 2025
details: - Fixed a server stability issue that could cause disconnections during co-op play.
- The Community Challenge reward code for the 'Maliwannabee' skin has been extended.
